_meta.description: Prompts for LLM to generate affiliate program page copy. Target audience: potential partners/affiliates.
_meta.note: Focus on earning potential and ease of getting started. Be transparent about terms.

metadata.title: Page title for SEO. Include key benefit. Ex: 'Affiliate Program - Earn Recurring Commissions', 'Partner Program - {rate} Commission'
metadata.description: Meta description for SEO. Mention rate and type of commission. ~150 chars.
metadata.keywords: SEO keywords. Ex: 'affiliate program, recurring commissions, partner program, referral program'

nav.header: Nav link text for header menu. Short. Ex: 'Affiliates', 'Partners', 'Earn Money'
nav.footer: Nav link text for footer. Can be more descriptive. Ex: 'Become a Partner', 'Affiliate Program'

hero.title: Main headline. Lead with the earning potential. Ex: 'Earn Recurring Commissions', 'Get Paid to Share {Product}'
hero.subtitle: Expand on opportunity. Include commission rate with {rate} placeholder. Ex: 'Join our affiliate program and earn {rate} commission on every referral'
hero.cta: Primary action to sign up. Ex: 'Start Earning Today', 'Become an Affiliate', 'Join the Program'
hero.subtext: Trust signals below CTA. Remove objections. Ex: 'Free to join ‚Ä¢ No minimum sales ‚Ä¢ Monthly payouts'

benefits.title: Section heading. Ex: 'Why Partner With Us?', 'Partner Benefits', 'What You Get'

highCommissions.title: Benefit heading. Ex: 'High Commissions', 'Industry-Leading Rates'
highCommissions.description: Explain the rate and duration. Include {rate} placeholder. Ex: 'Earn {rate} recurring commission on all referred customers for as long as they remain subscribed'

recurring.title: Benefit heading. Ex: 'Recurring Revenue', 'Passive Income Stream'
recurring.description: Emphasize monthly recurring aspect. Ex: 'Build a passive income stream with monthly recurring commissions'

support.title: Benefit heading. Ex: 'Full Support', 'We've Got Your Back'
support.description: What help they get. Ex: 'Get marketing materials, dedicated support, and real-time tracking dashboard'

howItWorks.title: Section heading. Ex: 'How It Works', 'Get Started in 3 Steps', 'Simple Process'

step1.title: Step 1 heading. Ex: 'Sign Up', 'Join Free'
step1.description: Emphasize ease and speed. Ex: 'Join our affiliate program for free in just 2 minutes'

step2.title: Step 2 heading. Ex: 'Share Your Link', 'Promote'
step2.description: How they promote. Ex: 'Promote our product using your unique referral link or coupon code'

step3.title: Step 3 heading. Ex: 'Earn Commissions', 'Get Paid'
step3.description: Payment cadence. Ex: 'Get paid monthly for every customer you refer'

form.title: Form section heading. Create urgency. Ex: 'Ready to Start Earning?', 'Apply Now'
form.subtitle: Form description. Ex: 'Apply to become an affiliate partner today'
form.notConfigured: Message when Rewardful not set up yet. Be helpful. Ex: 'The affiliate application form is being set up. Please check back soon.'

features.free: No cost to join. Ex: 'Free to join - no fees ever'
features.instant: Quick approval. Ex: 'Instant approval for qualified partners'

faq.title: FAQ section heading. Ex: 'Frequently Asked Questions', 'Common Questions', 'Got Questions?'
faq._note: Each Q&A should address common objections and provide transparency. Be specific about rates, payment terms, tracking.

calculator.title: Calculator section heading. Ex: 'Calculate Your Earnings', 'See Your Potential'
calculator.subtitle: Calculator description. Ex: 'See how much you could earn as an affiliate partner'
calculator.inputLabel: Label for input field. Ex: 'How many clients can you refer per month?', 'Monthly referrals'
calculator.monthlyTotal: Label for calculated total. Include {month} placeholder. Ex: 'Total in {month}', 'Monthly earnings'
calculator.calculation: Calculation explanation. Include {clients} placeholder. Ex: 'Based on {clients} clients/month'
calculator.estimatedClicks: Clicks needed. Include {min} and {max} placeholders. Ex: 'Estimated clicks needed: {min} - {max}'
calculator.conversionNote: Conversion rate explanation. Ex: '(based on 1-10% conversion rate)'
calculator.disclaimer: Legal disclaimer. Include {clients} placeholder. Ex: '* Calculations based on {clients} new clients per month. Actual earnings may vary based on customer retention and subscription plans.'
calculator.chartTitle: Chart heading. Ex: 'Accumulated Earnings Over Time', 'Growth Projection'

insights.title: Insights section heading. Ex: 'Partner Success Insights', 'Pro Tips'
insights.benchmark: Realistic benchmark label. Ex: 'Realistic Benchmark:', 'What to expect'
insights.benchmarkDetail: Benchmark details. Include {amount} placeholder. Ex: 'With 5 clients per month, you could earn ‚Ç¨{amount} in 6 months through recurring commissions.'
insights.qualityTip: Quality over quantity tip. Ex: 'Focus on quality over quantity. Long-term customers are more valuable than quick churners.'
insights.trustTip: Trust-building tip. Ex: 'Build trust first, sales follow naturally.'

calculator.tierPro: Message when reaching PRO tier. Ex: 'üéØ PRO Tier Unlocked! You're earning 35% commission with 6-month duration'
calculator.tierElite: Message when reaching ELITE tier. Ex: 'üèÜ ELITE Tier Achieved! Maximum 50% commission rate activated!'

stickyCta.text: Sticky CTA button text. Ex: 'Become an Affiliate', 'Join Now'
stickyCta.subtext: Text below sticky button. Ex: 'Start earning today', 'Free to join'
